languages.text: "Принимаем сообщение: "Зона ксеноартефакта объявлена запретной, приближение будет считаться мятежом против Императора. Уходите, иначе будете уничтожены". Лорд-капитан, для ответного послания вызвать на связь вокс-клериков или палубу главного калибра?"

"Incoming message: 'You are entering an area declared forbidden. Any attempt to approach the xeno-artefact will be considered an act of rebellion against the Emperor. Leave now or be destroyed.' Lord Cap'n, would you prefer to send your reply with the help of the vox-clerics or the main gun deck?"
languages.original_text: "Принимаем сообщение: "Зона ксеноартефакта объявлена запретной, приближение будет считаться мятежом против Императора. Уходите, иначе будете уничтожены". Лорд-капитан, для ответного послания вызвать на связь вокс-клериков или палубу главного калибра?"

traits.locale_text: "Receiving a message: ‘The xeno-artefact zone is declared forbidden. Further approach will be considered a rebellion against the Emperor. Leave now or be destroyed.' Lord Captain, shall we call vox-clerics or the main calibre deck for an answer?"

"Receiving a message: ‘The xeno-artefact zone is declared forbidden. Further approach will be considered a rebellion against the Emperor. Leave now or be destroyed.' Lord Captain, shall we call vox-clerics or the main calibre deck for an answer?"

"Incoming message: ‘The xeno-artefact zone is declared forbidden. Further approach will be considered an act of rebellion against the Emperor. Leave now or be destroyed.' Lord Captain, shall we call the vox-clerics or the main calibre deck to reply?"

"Incoming message: ‘The xeno-artefact zone is declared forbidden. Further approach will be considered an act of rebellion against the Emperor. Leave now or be destroyed.' Lord Captain, shall we call the vox-clerics or the main calibre deck to reply?"

"Incoming message: 'You are entering an area declared forbidden. Any attempt to approach the xeno-artefact will be considered an act of rebellion against the Emperor. Leave now or be destroyed.' Lord Cap'n, would you prefer to send your reply with the help of the vox-clerics or the main gun deck?"

languages.text: “我们收到了信息：‘对方舰船，你们正在闯入禁止进入的区域。若是进一步接近那件异形造物，将会被视为对帝皇的反叛行为。立刻离开，否则准备面临毁灭。’船长老大，咱们是找音阵牧师来回答，还是直接让主炮甲板给他们个答复？”
languages.original_text: "Incoming message: 'You are entering an area declared forbidden. Any attempt to approach the xeno-artefact will be considered an act of rebellion against the Emperor. Leave now or be destroyed.' Lord Cap'n, would you prefer to send your reply with the help of the vox-clerics or the main gun deck?"

traits.locale_text: “我们收到了信息：‘对方舰船，你们正在闯入禁止进入的区域。若是进一步接近那件异形造物，将会被视为对帝皇的反叛行为。立刻离开，否则准备面临毁灭。’船长老大，咱们是找音阵牧师来回答，还是直接让主炮甲板给他们个答复？”

languages.text: « Message reçu : "Vous entrez dans un secteur interdit. Toute tentative d'approche du xéno-artefact sera considérée comme un acte de rébellion contre l'Empereur. Faites demi-tour, ou vous serez détruits." {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine}, vous préférez répondre par l'intermédiaire des clercs-vox ou bien du pont-batterie principal ? »
languages.original_text: "Incoming message: 'You are entering an area declared forbidden. Any attempt to approach the xeno-artefact will be considered an act of rebellion against the Emperor. Leave now or be destroyed.' Lord Cap'n, would you prefer to send your reply with the help of the vox-clerics or the main gun deck?"

traits.locale_text: « Message reçu : "Vous entrez dans un secteur interdit. Toute tentative d'approche du xéno-artefact sera considérée comme un acte de rébellion contre l'Empereur. Faites demi-tour, ou vous serez détruits." {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine}, vous préférez répondre par l'intermédiaire des clercs-vox ou bien du pont-batterie principal ? »

languages.text: "Eingehende Nachricht: 'Das Eindringen in dieses Gebiet ist strengstens verboten. Jeder Versuch, sich dem Xeno-Artefakt zu nähern, wird als Akt der Rebellion gegen den Imperator gewertet. Dreht um oder werdet vernichtet.' Lord Cap'n, möchtet Ihr Eure Antwort lieber mit Hilfe der Vox-Kleriker senden oder mit Hilfe des Hauptgeschützdecks?"
languages.original_text: "Incoming message: 'You are entering an area declared forbidden. Any attempt to approach the xeno-artefact will be considered an act of rebellion against the Emperor. Leave now or be destroyed.' Lord Cap'n, would you prefer to send your reply with the help of the vox-clerics or the main gun deck?"

traits.locale_text: "Eingehende Nachricht: 'Das Eindringen in dieses Gebiet ist strengstens verboten. Jeder Versuch, sich dem Xeno-Artefakt zu nähern, wird als Akt der Rebellion gegen den Imperator gewertet. Dreht um oder werdet vernichtet.' Lord Cap'n, möchtet Ihr Eure Antwort lieber mit Hilfe der Vox-Kleriker senden oder mit Hilfe des Hauptgeschützdecks?"

languages.text: «Estamos recibiendo un mensaje: "Se acerca a una zona prohibida. Cualquier intento de aproximación al xenoartefacto será considerado un acto de rebeldía contra el Emperador. Márchese o será destruido". Lord Capitán, ¿quiere responder mediante los vococlérigos o con la batería principal?».
languages.original_text: "Incoming message: 'You are entering an area declared forbidden. Any attempt to approach the xeno-artefact will be considered an act of rebellion against the Emperor. Leave now or be destroyed.' Lord Cap'n, would you prefer to send your reply with the help of the vox-clerics or the main gun deck?"

traits.locale_text: «Estamos recibiendo un mensaje: "Se acerca a una zona prohibida. Cualquier intento de aproximación al xenoartefacto será considerado un acto de rebeldía contra el Emperador. Márchese o será destruido. Lord Capitán, ¿quiere responder mediante los vococlérigos o con la batería principal?».

languages.text: 「メッセージを受信しました：『立ち入り禁止区域に入ります。異種族のアーティファクトに近づこうとする行為は、皇帝への反逆行為とみなされます。今すぐ立ち去らないと、破壊されます』。ロードキャプテン、返答はヴォクス・クレリックか、主砲甲板のどちらで送りますか？」
languages.original_text: "Incoming message: 'You are entering an area declared forbidden. Any attempt to approach the xeno-artefact will be considered an act of rebellion against the Emperor. Leave now or be destroyed.' Lord Cap'n, would you prefer to send your reply with the help of the vox-clerics or the main gun deck?"

traits.locale_text: 「メッセージを受信しました：『立ち入り禁止区域に入ります。異種族のアーティファクトに近づこうとする行為は、皇帝への反逆行為とみなされます。今すぐ立ち去らないと、破壊されます』。ロードキャプテン、返答はヴォクス・クレリックか、主砲甲板のどちらで送りますか？」

languages.text: "İleti alınıyor: 'Yasaklı bir bölgeye giriş yapmaktasınız. Zeno eserine yaklaşmaya teşebbüs etmeniz hâlinde İmparator'a ihanette bulunmuş sayılacaksınız. Derhâl ayrılmazsanız imha edileceksiniz.' Lord Kaptan, cevabınızı voks ruhbanları aracılığıyla mı yoksa ana silah güvertesinden mi vermek istersiniz?"
languages.original_text: "Incoming message: 'You are entering an area declared forbidden. Any attempt to approach the xeno-artefact will be considered an act of rebellion against the Emperor. Leave now or be destroyed.' Lord Cap'n, would you prefer to send your reply with the help of the vox-clerics or the main gun deck?"
